mr.go.sgfilter

Class Linearizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • mr.go.sgfilter.Linearizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Preprocessor

    public class Linearizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Preprocessor
    Linearizes data by seeking points with relative difference greater than truncateRatio and replacing them with points lying on line between the first and the last of such points. Strictly:

    let delta(i) be function which assigns to an element at index i (data[i]), for 0 <= i < data.length - 1, value of |(data[i] - data[i+1])/data[i]|. Then for each range (j,k) of data, such that delta(j) > truncateRatio and delta(k) <= truncateRatio, data[x] = ((data[k] - data[j])/(k - j)) * (x - k) + data[j]) for j <= x <= k.

    Author:
    Marcin Rze≈∫nicki
